General.Name: Hybrigenics
General.Description: Hybrigenics SA, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a biotechnology company in France. The company engages in development of biotechnology in the field of biotechnology, oncology, regenerative medicine, and anti-aging medicine. It is also involved in the development of technical solutions using adipose tissue cells and stem cells. The company is headquartered in Gallargues-le-Montueux, France. Hybrigenics SA is a subsidiary of Diagnostic Medical Systems S.A.
General.Address: 9 avenue du canal Philippe Lamour, Gallargues-le-Montueux, France, 30660
